thread.title: "Hamilton" set to hit Memphis' Orpheum Theatre during 2018-2019 season - Nashville Business Journal
thread.title_full: "Hamilton" set to hit Memphis' Orpheum Theatre during 2018-2019 season - Nashville Business Journal

author: Elle Perry
title: "Hamilton" set to hit Memphis' Orpheum Theatre during 2018-2019 season - Nashville Business Journal

organizations.name: hamilton" courtesy denver center for the performing arts memphis

text: Poster for the Broadway musical "Hamilton" Courtesy Denver Center for the Performing Arts The good news? "Hamilton," the smash-hit Broadway musical, is coming to Tennessee. The bad news? For now, it looks like you'll have to wait a while, and then drive a while longer, to get to see it. Poster for the Broadway musical "Hamilton" Courtesy Denver Center for the Performing Arts Memphis' Orpheum Theatre announced Monday that the musical is coming as part of its 2018-19 season. The Tony, Grammy and Pulitzer Prize-winning hip hop musical by Lin-Manuel Miranda is based on Ron Chernow 's 800-page biography of Alexander Hamilton, America's first treasury secretary. The musical quickly became the hottest ticket on Broadway and made Miranda an A-list celebrity. The Tennessee Performing Arts Center in downtown Nashville is set to release its 2017-18 line-up in April. Elle Perry covers hospitality, tourism and health care. Bizspace Spotlight
